segments.text: Uh, Miss Bhavana. I'm calling for the Max Life Policy, okay?
segments.speaker: doctor

segments.text: Uh, I'm Dr. Mohammed Wasi, calling on behalf of Max Life Insurance. Can I speak to Ms. Bhavana?
segments.speaker: doctor

segments.text: Uh, so ma'am, which language would you like to prefer? Tamil, English, Hindi?
segments.speaker: doctor

segments.text: Okay, uh, so can we proceed with English?
segments.speaker: doctor

segments.text: Okay, ma'am. So this call is with reference to your online term plan. In order to proceed with your proposal, we need to conduct a telephonic medical verification in which I will ask you some verification medical history questions.
segments.speaker: doctor

segments.text: Ma'am, please note that this call is being recorded for quality and audit purpose.
segments.speaker: doctor

segments.text: For verification, I have all your details in front of me on my system. To start with, I see that your full name given in the application is Bhavana. Can I know your date of birth as given in the application, ma'am?
segments.speaker: doctor

segments.text: Ma'am, as I can see, your application ID is MOCA2MAS14152.
segments.speaker: doctor

segments.text: Ma'am, can you, can you tell your PAN card number, ma'am?
segments.speaker: doctor

segments.text: Okay, ma'am. Ma'am, can you tell your nominee name?

segments.text: Okay, ma'am. Can you tell nominee date of birth, ma'am?
segments.speaker: doctor

segments.text: Ma'am, I'm sure you have given medical history in the test, but as telephonic medical verification is vital for the issue of policy, I will take you through a set of medical questions again, ma'am.

segments.text: Ma'am, uh, ma'am, have you undergone any of the tests like mammogram, ultrasound, pap smear, ma'am?

segments.text: Okay, ma'am. Ma'am, uh, do you have any history of chest pain, heart attack, palpitations, and breathlessness or any other cardiovascular disease, ma'am?
segments.speaker: doctor

segments.text: Okay, ma'am. Ma'am, do you have any history of hypertension, high blood pressure or high cholesterol?

segments.text: Okay, ma'am. Ma'am, are you taking any medication for that?

segments.text: Okay, ma'am. When was it diagnosed?

segments.text: No, no, no, I don't remember that.

segments.text: Okay, ma'am. Proceeding to the next question, ma'am. Do you have high diabetes or thyroid disorder or any other endocrine disorder?

segments.text: Okay, ma'am. Do you have any history of diseases related to kidney such as kidney failure, kidney or ureteric stones, blood or pus in urine or prostate or bladder disorders? Or sorry, like, do you have any history of...

segments.speaker: doctor

segments.text: Okay, ma'am. Ma'am, have you been off work due to illness or for a continuous period of more than 10 days during the last one year?
